i am a mom with two sons and a husband.

My work schedule is hectic and I have trouble staying in touch with my family.

content.text: Hey there, what's your name?
I am Emily, nice to meet you!
Emily, great name! What do you do for a living?
I'm a translator, it's a lot of work but I love it!
I can imagine, translating can be pretty tough! What's your favorite part of the job?
I love being able to learn about new cultures and languages, and I really enjoy the challenge of being able to communicate ideas from one language to another.
That's really cool! I'm a doctor, so I really value communication and understanding.
I bet! I can't imagine how stressful it must be to be a doctor, but I'm sure it's very rewarding.
It can be, but it's also really rewarding to be able to help people.
That's awesome! I'm sure you're a great doctor.
Thanks! I try my best.
Well, it sounds like you have a really great job! What do you like to do outside of work?
I love to read, play guitar, and spend time with my cat Leroy.
Those all sound like great hobbies! I love to read too, and I have a dog named Buddy.
Oh, that's awesome! What kind of dog is Buddy?
He's a golden retriever! He's the sweetest dog ever.
I bet! Golden retrievers are such loving dogs.
They are! He's my best friend.
I'm glad to hear that! I love dogs.
Me too! They're the best.
I think we're going to be good friends, Emily.
I think so too, Matt
